updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update in UTC (ISO8601 format).

timezone.description: Timezone of the account as the offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

time_format.description: Time format used for the account. Either 12-hour clock 12H or 24-hour clock 24H.

subdomain.description: Subdomain of the account, null for legacy accounts.

phone.description: Contact phone number of the account.

currency.description: Currency of the account as the 3-character currency code in ISO4217 format.

created_at.description: Date and time of the accountâ€™s creation in UTC (ISO8601 format).
